remarks: The limit of natural powers, is the natural power of the limit. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 29-Jun-2017.)
statement:
climexp.1 $e |- F/ k ph $.
climexp.2 $e |- F/_ k F $.
climexp.3 $e |- F/_ k H $.
climexp.4 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climexp.5 $e |- ( ph -> M e. ZZ ) $.
climexp.6 $e |- ( ph -> F : Z --> CC ) $.
climexp.7 $e |- ( ph -> F ~~> A ) $.
climexp.8 $e |- ( ph -> N e. NN0 ) $.
climexp.9 $e |- ( ph -> H e. V ) $.
climexp.10 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( H ` k ) = ( ( F ` k ) ^ N ) ) $.
climexp $p |- ( ph -> H ~~> ( A ^ N ) ) $.
$d N k $.
$d Z k $.
